page.title: 20Great Bromley
page.content: Great Bromley is a widespread village in between Colchester and Manningtree.It is divided into three main areas, Hare Green, The Burnt Heath and the Village centre. It is an old village, it has an old Church and a small school and a village hall. The main street is called Brook Street. The houses are mainly around Hare Green and Burnt Heath.There are lots of fields and there is a Village sign by the pub called Spread Edge,there are also lots of Farm Shops which sell own grown vegtables and fruit. Lynn Thorington, 12 years old.
